library.description:
LiveScript is a language which compiles to JavaScript. It is a fork of Coco which is in turn derived from CoffeeScript. Like those two it has a relatively straightforward mapping to JavaScript. LiveScript is Coco but much more compatible with CoffeeScript, more functional, and more feature rich. LiveScript aims for increased expressiveness and code beauty.
While adding features to assist in functional style programming, LiveScript also deeply supports imperative and object oriented programming, and has an optional class system with inheritance, calls to super, and more.
library.name: LiveScript

library.description: Closure FX Builder is a stand-alone and feature-rich application for Google Closure Tools that allows you to minify, obfuscate and debug JavaScript code.
library.name: Closure FX Builder

library.description:
LMD - JavaScript Module-Assembler for building better web applications

Why LMD?

You can write your modules in any style: LMD, AMD, Node.js, your_own. LMD package is fully-zero-isolated from globals. Config inheritance: Easy to setup multiply builds. Flexible source: from 500bytes. Integrated code-coverage, source analytics tools, transparent localStorage cache.
library.name: LMD

library.description: kquery is a pure-JavaScript css selector engine with full implemention of css3 selector. compatible for all major browsers ie6+/chrome/firefox/opera/safari, only 8.0kB minified and gzipped. smart compiler engine will optimize the query logic, keep these which really needs. it's faster than all Sizzle(jquery) version, nwmatcher, peppy without cache, dojo/query. never cache results, query function was cached,  works on both XML/HTML.
library.name: kquery

library.description: Continuum is a next-generation JavaScript (ES6) Virtual Machine written in last generation JavaScript (ES3). It assembles bytecode from sourcecode and executes it an ES6 runtime environment.
library.name: Continuum
